android.smartcard
Interface SmartcardClient.ISmartcardConnectionListener

Enclosing class:
SmartcardClient
public static interface SmartcardClient.ISmartcardConnectionListener

Interface definition of smartcard listener to be informed about smartcard service connect and disconnect events.

Method Summary
 void serviceConnected()
          Called when the smartcard service is connected or reconnected.
 void serviceDisconnected()
          Called when the smartcard service is disconnected (because it died).
 

Method Detail

serviceConnected

void serviceConnected()
Called when the smartcard service is connected or reconnected.

serviceDisconnected

void serviceDisconnected()
Called when the smartcard service is disconnected (because it died).
